name: Guardian of The Demon Valley
description: This is an exciting shooting game.The game is set in a dark canyon, you’ll play a warrior who swears to defend the saint ice crystal that seals the devil with his life. would you be able to complete the mission of defending the sealing ice crystal against the horrible monsters’ continuous offensive?!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970,AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980
